mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS weekly_post_count FROM post WHERE post_create_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND post_blind_yn = FALSE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS weekly_comment_count FROM comment WHERE com_create_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND com_blind_yn = FALSE

SELECT b.board_idx, b.board_name, b.com_yn, COUNT(DISTINCT p.post_idx) AS post_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN c.com_blind_yn = FALSE AND c.com_create_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY THEN c.com_idx END) AS comment_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN post p ON b.board_idx = p.board_idx AND p.post_blind_yn = FALSE LEFT JOIN comment c ON p.post_idx = c.post_idx GROUP BY b.board_idx, b.board_name, b.com_yn ORDER BY b.board_idx

SELECT p.post_idx AS post_idx, p.post_title AS post_title, p.id AS id, p.post_view_cnt AS post_view_cnt, COUNT(l.like_type) AS like_count, p.post_create_date AS post_create_date FROM post p LEFT JOIN likeYn l ON p.post_idx = l.post_idx AND l.like_type = 1 WHERE p.post_create_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND p.post_blind_yn = FALSE GROUP BY p.post_idx, p.post_title, p.id, p.post_view_cnt, p.post_create_date ORDER BY like_count DESC, p.post_view_cnt DESC LIMIT 10
